daily_activities: Explore the Nightlife at Khao San Road
Hike to the top of Mount Phu Kao in Chiang Mai
Visit the Chiang Mai Night Bazaar for Shopping
Dine at a local restaurant for traditional Thai cuisine
Explore the ancient temples of Angkor Wat
Go on a trek through the jungles of Angkor Wat
Take a cooking class to learn about local cuisine
Enjoy the nightlife at Pub Street
Explore the Batu Caves and learn about Hindu mythology
Go on a hiking trip to the Taman Negara National Park
Visit the Kuala Lumpur Tower for panoramic views of the city
Shop at the Bukit Bintang district

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to major airports in South East Asia such as Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK) in Bangkok, Thailand; Changi Airport (SIN) in Singapore; or Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KUL) in Malaysia. Connecting flights may be required depending on the destination.
